Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

I was born on May 31, 1987 in Voronezh. I studied at the Koltsov's Gymnasium. At school I got carried away with Olympiad programming. Then I graduated from the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics of Voronezh State University as a specialty system programmer. I have been working as a software engineer since 2009 as a backend developer and data engineer.

Stack:

  • Backend:
    • Python/Django
    • Go/K8s
  • Frontend:
    • TypeScript/React
  • Databases:
    • PostgreSQL
    • SQLite
    • MongoDB
    • EdgeDB
  • Cloud Services:
    • AWS
    • GC
    • Azure
